DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Manager Activities Dashboard
User Fields
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":"","WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"SELECT	job.*, 
        duf.*, 
        ws.Name as StateName, 
        ws.Color as StateColor,
        (select usr.Name from [User] usr, Deliverable del where del.Oid = job.Id and usr.Oid = del.CreatedBy) as CreatedByName,
        (select string_agg(convert(nvarchar(50), ass.[User]), ',') from Assignment ass, AssignmentType ast where ass.DocumentOid = job.Oid and ast.Name = 'Executor' and ass.AssignmentType = ast.Oid) as ExecutorId,
        (select string_agg(convert(nvarchar(50), usr2.Name), ',') from Assignment ass, AssignmentType ast, [User] usr2 where usr2.Oid = ass.[User] and ass.DocumentOid = job.Oid and ast.Name = 'Executor' and ass.AssignmentType = ast.Oid) as Executor,
        (select STRING_AGG(convert(nvarchar(50), ass.[User]), ',') from Assignment ass, AssignmentType ast where ass.DocumentOid = job.Oid and ast.Name = 'Responsible' and ass.AssignmentType = ast.Oid) AS ResponsibleId,
        (select string_agg(convert(nvarchar(50), usr3.Name), ',') from Assignment ass, AssignmentType ast, [User] usr3 where usr3.Oid = ass.[User] and ass.DocumentOid = job.Oid and ast.Name = 'Responsible' and ass.AssignmentType = ast.Oid) as Responsible
FROM	[Analytics].[Job](@CurrentUserId) job LEFT OUTER JOIN Deliverable_userFields duf ON (job.Oid = duf.Oid) LEFT OUTER JOIN WorkflowState ws ON (job.StateId = ws.Oid) 
WHERE   job.[Date] BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate  and
        (job.[CompanyId]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
        (job.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
        (job.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') AND
        ws.name in ('Devolvido ao Solicitante', 'Em Aprovação AP/Execução', 'Em Aprovação do Cliente',
            'Em Execução', 'Em Orçamentação', 'Em Prep. AP / Execução', 'Em Produção', 'Por Aprovar Internamente',
            'Em Distribuição')","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate","Department","Company","Division"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Manager Activities Dashboard
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"rangeselector","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#e0e0e0","WidgetHeight":30,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"SELECT  	DATEADD(dd, - (DATEPART(dw, job.[Date] - 2)), job.[Date]) AS WeekStart, 
			[Year], 
			[Month], 
			CONVERT(int, CONCAT(year(job.[Date]), DATEPART(wk, job.[Date]))) as [YearWeek], 
			SUM(CASE WHEN job.StateTypeCode IN (6) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as [Closed],
			SUM(CASE WHEN job.StateTypeCode NOT IN (6) THEN -1 ELSE 0 END) as [Open]
FROM    	[Analytics].[Job](@CurrentUserId) job
WHERE   	Year(job.[Date]) = @year AND
			(job.[CompanyId]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') AND
			(job.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') AND
			(job.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
GROUP BY	DATEADD(dd, - (DATEPART(dw, job.[Date] - 2)), job.[Date]), [Year], [Month], CONVERT(int, CONCAT(year(job.[Date]), DATEPART(wk, job.[Date])))
UNION ALL
SELECT		MIN(Day) as WeekStart,
			YEAR(MIN(Day)) [Year],
			MONTH(MIN(Day)) [Month],
			Convert(int, CONCAT(year(MIN(Day)), DATEPART(wk, MIN(Day)))) as [YearWeek], 
        	0 as [Closed], 
        	0 as [Open]
FROM 		YearDay WHERE Year(Day) = @year
GROUP BY	DATEPART(yyyy, Day), DATEPART(ww, Day)","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["year","Company","Department","Division"]}}]
